EmailTemplate.subject: Step Forward and Marriott Hotels
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Marriott Hotels Want You!
We're proud to announce that Step Forward has partnered with Marriot Hotels to bring you a new Hospitality pathway.
As you are yet to accept your conditional offer we want you to have the opportunity to register your interest.
Do you want to develop your skills in the largest hotel chain in the world? Looking for an opportunity with a clear route to management? Mariott Hotels are hiring for the next generation of hospitality professionals!
Tell me more.
As a Marriott Apprentice, your first year will be fully supported with training and guidance from Step Forward. You then have the opportunity to continue with Marriott on an apprenticeship with a difference.
Join us and we’ll support you to reach your full potential. Bring us your passion and determination to succeed and we’ll show you a world of opportunity that reaches every corner of the globe.
Year One
Receive world class training on the job and move into a supervisory role.
Year Two
Possibility to secure full-time employment, earn up to £14,000 and accelerate your career path.
Year Three
Potential to secure a job anywhere in the world in a Marriott Hotel
Yes please, what next?
Take 2 minutes to start your journey today by registering your interest in the Hospitality pathway using the link below.
{!Step_Forward_Activity__c.TEMP_Link_to_Hospitality_Pathway_Form__c}
You will then be invited to a hospitality assessment where you can test your skills and find out more about what the pathway will involve. Our next assessments are happening soon so take the first step to securing your future now.
Please note: If you would like to accept your conditional offer in your current pathways you should click here
www.stepforward.uk.com
